docs.snippet: Jonathan Weisman’s “(((Semitism)))” takes American Jews to task for not being vigilant enough about threats to democratic norms.

docs.snippet: The department’s inspector general announced that he would examine whether law enforcement officials followed the law in seeking permission to surveil a former Trump campaign adviser.

docs.snippet: John O. Brennan said Russia may have compromising information on President Trump, setting off furious speculation about whether the former spy chief was basing that assertion on inside information.

docs.snippet: The Republican Party has gotten where it is because of the president, not in spite of him.

The American president wants what he wants.
